name: Circuitus
description: Circuitus is an oscilloscope themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a resilient and charismatic personality, Circuitus overcomes challenges with its unique set of abilities. Its broken screen serves as a reminder of the battles it has fought as a soldier in the digital realm. Equipped with sturdy box armor and nimble cat-shaped buttons, Circuitus is ready to tackle any task that comes its way.
